mapper.sql: SELECT s.id AS "Id", s.nickname AS "Nickname", s.userpassword AS "Userpassword", s.username AS "Username", s.age AS "Age", s.phone AS "Phone", s.portrait AS "Portrait", s.address AS "Address", s.citys AS "Citys", s.gender AS "Gender", s.isvip AS "Isvip", s.status AS "Status" FROM app_user s
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_user( id, nickname, userpassword, username, age, phone, portrait, address, citys, gender, isvip, status )VALUES( #{id}, #{nickname}, #{userpassword}, #{username}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{portrait}, #{address}, #{citys}, #{gender}, #{isvip}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE app_user SET id = #{id}, nickname = #{nickname}, userpassword = #{userpassword}, username = #{username}, age = #{age}, phone = #{phone}, portrait = #{portrait}, address = #{address}, citys = #{citys}, gender = #{gender}, isvip = #{isvip}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
